## jx delete env

Deletes one or more environments

### Synopsis

Deletes one or more environments.

```
jx delete env [flags]
```

### Examples

```
  # Deletes an environment
  jx delete env staging
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help        help for env
  -n, --namespace   Delete the namespace for the Environment too?
```
